https://skillpath.com/blog/effective-teamwork

- **Clear Communication**: Team members must communicate openly and ensure everyone feels heard.
- **Trust**: Building trust among members is critical for strong collaboration.
- **Clear Goals**: Teams need well-defined goals so everyone moves in the same direction.
- **Good Leadership**: A strong leader helps guide the team, solve conflicts, and keep motivation high.
- **Flexibility**: Successful teams are able to adapt quickly to changes and unexpected challenges.
- **Continuous Improvement**: Teams should always look for ways to improve their processes and performance.
